title: Try to consolidate your loans: the best answer to all your problems (Easyapprovalforloans)
text: By Easyapprovalforloans Oct 20, 2015 Are you submerged in debt or are having issues in repaying them? If they are getting out of hands, then take help or aid, as you have to act on them sooner, rather than later. So, here are so questions that you need to ask;Q 1Is meeting monthly payments becoming hard for you?SolutionTry consolidating (all loans into 1) so that you can have a much reduced payment bill and you will be able to better manage all your loans. Q 2How to manage multiple loans (car, house etc)?SolutionManaging multiple loans is equal to paying various sets of rate of interest, which can be hard to manage. Debt consolidation comes in handy as it allows you to better manage, keep track and reduce your payment amounts. Q 3I've a default and negative listing in my credit score?SolutionThen you will have a very few loan optionsQ 4Are your debts petty high in nature?SolutionDebt consolidation loans can lower them!Q 5Is there any equity on your house?SolutionIf not, then use it to clear your debts quicker. Q 6The best time to consolidate loans?Solutiona) When you think you need itb) When you cannot manage multiple loans Before you opt for the loanIf you are going for it; remember these stepsStep OneCheck your spending with a budget plannerStep TwoTake help of a borrowing cal-c to calculate what amount you should take and if the repaying amounts are good for you or not. Step ThreeLook for the best deal that has a good; rate of interest, features and low amount of fees.Step FourGet to know the credit provider by seeking the following documents;a credit guide The Credit Proposal Disclosure Document (CPDD), with needed data listing. Such as ACL or the Australian Credit license charges, feedback forms and numbers. Case Scenario StudyThere is a single mother with 2 Kids; and she cannot keep up with her huge loans and payments every single week. She has defaulted for the past 3 weeks. The mother sorted help from an expert financial agent who told her to;Cut a deal with 1 loan payment planCut her monthly paymentsUltimately save money The profits that she attained are well described in the follow equation. The example of course believes that the mother has a mortgage of 300,000 Dollars and also has a credit card enabled along with a limit of 12000 dollars. Outstanding Home Loan Credit Card Total Loans Your New LoanAmount of Loan ($): 300,000-- 12,000 --312,000 --312,000Rate of Interest (%): 6.25 --18 --n/a--4.75The loan period (yrs): 25 -- n/a -- n/a -- 25 Monthly Repayment (4): 1,979.00 -- 200.00 --2,179.00 --1,778.00Total Interest Payable ($): 293,702 -- 18,931 -- 312,633 -- 221,630Except from above:The mother actually saved $91,003.00And her monthly bills got down by $401.00 Hence, if your debts are going haywire and you are struggling to cover them, then you must take aid from an expert who can guide you perfectly through this storm. So, make sure you take the aid of a professional financial agent or a broker, who can sort you out whilst you take the option of consolidating. He or she will aid you with;Making sure you have 1 single monthly payment to make and that also with a low rate of interest. Recommendations: Just do not go to a person who says that he or she can help you with your debts and portrays that he or she can help you with whatever absurd amounts of loan you have. But, do not fall for that trap, and only get a professional, certified, licensed and educated financial agent broker who can make sure your debts can come down. About the Author
